author: Good Computer Guy

changelog.release_notes:
Bug fixes.
Removed "Loading..." text from weather.

Removed second hand to increase battery life.
Changed weather update to every 15 minutes on the minute (for example: 12:00, 12:15, 12:30, 12:45.) Weather also still updates when the watchface reloads from Timeline or another app.

Added step count. Future release will include a setting to turn that off.
Fixed Weather Underground API key bug generating too many requests errorrs.

Added Weather Underground as an option.
Updated configuration page to allow for user WU API key.
Added configuration page to choose F or C. Weather Underground and more configuration options coming soon!

description:
Give a Heart if you like... Contact me at the developer contact if you have any issues or comments.

The latest versions adds your current step count at the 3:00 position. Future versions will allow you to turn that off in Settings.

Optional weather from Weather Underground!

A simple analog watchface that gets weather every 15 minutes, on the quarter hour. The default weather source is OpenWeatherMap but if you get a free API key from Weather Underground the weather data will come from there. Simply go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/pricing. Please email me if you have any trouble.

The green/red bar shows the battery level. A double-vibration and bluetooth icon indicate a disconnect.

You will need to have Location services enabled on your phone or else the weather will never load because it doesn't know where you are. The temperature is now available in either Fahrenheit or Celsius and can be changed on the Settings page.

Future versions will be more customizable.

Please give a Heart if you like the watch, and email me at the Developer link below with issues, comments and suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes:
Bug fixes.
Removed "Loading..." text from weather.

title: Simple Analog Weather
